# ── requirements.txt ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Kept for Railway / Nixpacks deployment (which reads requirements.txt).
# The canonical dependency spec lives in pyproject.toml.
# The fully-pinned lockfile is requirements.lock (generated by pip-compile).
#
# Regenerate the lockfile:
#   pip-compile pyproject.toml --extra web -o requirements.lock --strip-extras
# ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
-r requirements.lock
